thread.title: UK's Prince Harry and fiancee Meghan invite 600 guests to wedding

title: UK's Prince Harry and fiancee Meghan invite 600 guests to wedding
text: March 22, 2018 / 3:23 PM / Updated 38 minutes ago UK's Prince Harry and fiancee Meghan invite 600 guests to wedding Reuters Staff 1 Min Read LONDON (Reuters) - Britain’s Prince Harry and his American fiancee Meghan Markle have invited 600 guests to their wedding in May, his office said on Thursday. Invitations for Britain's Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's wedding in Windsor Castle in May, are seen after they have been printed at the workshop of Barnard and Westwood in London, March 22, 2018. Victoria Jones/Pool via Reuters Kensington Palace said all those invited to the ceremony at St George’s Chapel on May 19 at Queen Elizabeth’s Windsor Castle would also be invited to the lunchtime reception afterwards. Slideshow (11 Images) Later in the evening, 200 guests will attend a private reception at nearby Frogmore House which will be hosted by Harry’s father, Prince Charles. The palace said the invitations, die-stamped in gold and then burnished with the edges beveled then gilded, had been sent out this week. There were no details of who had been invited. Reporting by Michael Holden; editing by Stephen Addison
